title: Rumpelstiltskin
short_plot_summary: A miller's daughter is told by her father to spin straw into gold to save her life, and Rumpelstiltskin helps her in exchange for items, culminating in a battle of wits.
explanation: A princess, representing the miller's daughter who is forced to spin straw into gold
A spool of thread, symbolizing the spinning of straw into gold
A sheaf of wheat, representing the straw that must be turned into gold
A scroll, signifying the contracts and bargains made throughout the story
An ogre, illustrating the character of Rumpelstiltskin who provides assistance with magical abilities
